Text: This is the entire 124 episode run of the Original Underdog Cartoon Series.
THANKS! I will seed as long as I can!
wow! thanks so much for your tremendous efforts with this - I can't wait to see 'em again after all these years

FarScape, Thank You.  This is greatly appreciated and I'll continue seeding.  I loved this show when I was a kid (especially the theme song(s).  I found a few of them on VHS and my kids fell in love.  Thank you.

I just wanted to say how much I appreciate the work you did on this, I was also wondering if there was anyway you could get the little shorts like Go Go Gophers, Klondike Kat, and the Commander McBragg.  If you could I sure would appreciate it thank you so very much!!!
